name: devops_basic Chef cookbook
readme:
devops_basic Cookbook
================
Basic DevOps setup:
- Create directories
- Download general scripts
- Install basic packages
- Check OS hardware resource
- etc

Requirements
------------
### Platform
- Debian/Ubuntu
